divs: Sighting DetailsI was siting alone in my garden on a warm summer night after midnight facing south. There was a full moon with a large bank of clouds between me and it. The clouds were very bright. I was suddenly startled by the appearance of a black triangle moving to the NE. I bolted to my feet saying what the heck was that. I never told anyone as I had never heard the words "black triangle". About a month ago I decided to google the words black triangle. To my surprise there were pages of information. I was relived that I wasn't alone with this experience. Sincerely, Kevin J Murphy Ph.D. PS: Not sure on date as I made no attempt to remember.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Cranston
There were no other sightings in Cranston on or around August 15th 2009
Summary: Black triangle came out of the south and flew north east.
